programme.title: How The 2019 Masters Was Won
programme.desc: A chance to relive the dramatic 2019 Masters at Augusta National Golf Club in Georgia. Watch every key twist and turn, and see how a legend of the game returned to win another Green Jacket.

programme.title: 1975: The Magnificent Masters
programme.desc: A look back at Jack Nicklaus' triumph at the 1975 Masters tournament from Augusta National Golf Club. The Golden Bear held his nerve to win his fifth green jacket.

programme.title: 1986: Jack's Glorious 18th
programme.desc: A Masters special celebrating the 30th anniversary of Jack Nicklaus' 1986 victory in Augusta. The Golden Bear seized his final and a record 18th major with victory at Augusta.

programme.title: Masters: The One From November
programme.desc: Amid the COVID-19 pandemic, it was a Masters like no other. With contributions from players and organisers, go behind the scenes of the 2020 tournament and see how it was held.

programme.title: The Major Heard Around The World
programme.desc: Former champions and golfing greats explain the international history of The Masters, charting its global expansion from its origins to Sarazen's shot heard around the world.
